title: The Story that Painted Itself - Read by The Hawrot Siblings
description: When muralist Kara can’t get the hands in her new painting just right, she notices something strange, the man she painted seems to move overnight. As his gestures change, they lead her on a real-life treasure hunt through her Ohio town’s history. With help from local kids and a ghostly librarian, Kara uncovers a hidden time capsule and learns the true power of art to keep stories alive.

title: Barely Scratching the Surface
description: It began as a simple exploration— a forgotten tunnel beneath Steubenville, a camera, and two men chasing the echoes of their childhood curiosity. But some doors, once opened, can never be shut again.

title: The Jeff Tech Files: A Small Town Cover-up
description: What if the end of sledding at Jeff Tech Hill wasn’t about safety—but a full-blown psyop?

title: Running for Dear Life!
description: Dale had seen her on his running route for months—the jogger with her orange scrunchie. But when fate finally brought them together, it came by way of something that shouldn’t exist.
